sentences.en: A rabbit got caught in the blades of the reaper.
sentences.cn: 一只兔子被卷到收割机的刀刃中去了.

sentences.en: Against Scorpion spam , Reaper has it's pro's and con's.
sentences.cn: 对抗蝎子海, 收割者有自己的优势和不足.

sentences.en: And herein is that saying true, One soweth and another reaper.
sentences.cn: 俗语说︰‘那人撒种,这人收割’,这话可见是真的.

sentences.en: Cut off from Babylon the sower, and the reaper with his sickle at harvest.
sentences.cn: 16你们要将巴比伦撒种的和收割时拿镰刀的都剪除了.

sentences.en: Deathmare buries herself in the shadow and darkness and becomes an unstoppable death reaper.
sentences.cn: 死魇将自己深埋在阴影与黑暗之中,并成为一名无法阻止的死神.

sentences.en: His mechanical reaper spelled the end of traditional farming, and the beginning of industrial agriculture.
sentences.cn: 他的收割机终结了传统农业, 开创了工业化农业的时代.

sentences.en: Improved Reaper's Scythe's leveling a bit.
sentences.cn: 强化了死灵法师的死神镰刀.

sentences.en: McCormick began to make his famous reaper in a grist mill.
sentences.cn: 麦考密克在磨坊中开始制作著名的收割机.

sentences.en: More zergling reinforcements arrive and kill reaper attempting to scout.
sentences.cn: 没想到有更多异化虫增援队列抵达,并击杀了一台试图侦察的收割者.

sentences.en: Natural selection is a grim natural reaper.
sentences.cn: 自然选择是自然界冷酷的死神.

sentences.en: One seed ; another gathers in the harvest; and both the sower and the reaper receive wages.
sentences.cn: 这人撒种,那人收割, 撒种的和收割的都得工价,都因劳苦所得的报酬一同快乐.

sentences.en: The grim reaper will bring change in both places soon.
sentences.cn: 死神即将给这两个地方带来变革.

sentences.en: The reaper leaped over a heap of cheap weapons.
sentences.cn: 收割者跃过一堆廉价的武器.

sentences.en: The reaper leaped over cheap of cheap weapons.
sentences.cn: 割取者跃过一堆价格低廉的武器.

sentences.en: William Wordsworth's The Solitary Reaper deserves to be the model of verbal music among English poems.
sentences.cn: 华兹华斯的《孤独的割麦女》堪称英诗作品中以文述乐的典范.

phrases.tran_cn: 狰狞持镰收割者（指死神）

trans.tran_en: A reaper is a machine used to cut and gather crops
